Description: Send product data feeds to external providers such as Google Shopping and Catch.com.au.
Name: Product Data Feeds

Methods.Name: MyShopping
Methods.Description: Generates feed content for MyShopping. Add Request Fields to this connector to create an XML feed.  Use the Field Location syntax of "[person].name" to build content from a list (or array) of data. Use "[person].@id" to build attributes. Use "[person].#cdata-section" to build character data.

Methods.Name: Google Shopping
Methods.Description: Generates feed content for Google Shopping. Add Request Fields to this connector to create an XML feed.  Use the Field Location syntax of "[person].name" to build content from a list (or array) of data. Use "[person].@id" to build attributes. Use "[person].#cdata-section" to build character data.

Methods.Name: Catch.com.au Offers
Methods.Description: Generates feed content for Catch.com.au Offers. Add Request Fields to this connector to create a delimited text file.  Use the Field Location syntax of "[].FieldName" to build content from a list (or array) of data.

Methods.Name: Catch.com.au Products
Methods.Description: Generates feed content for Catch.com.au Products. Add Request Fields to this connector to create a delimited text file.  Use the Field Location syntax of "[].FieldName" to build content from a list (or array) of data.

Methods.Name: GetPrice
Methods.Description: Generates feed content for GetPrice. Add Request Fields to this connector to create an XML feed.  Use the Field Location syntax of "[person].name" to build content from a list (or array) of data. Use "[person].@id" to build attributes. Use "[person].#cdata-section" to build character data.
